title: Siam Thailandisches Spezialitaten
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This Thai restaurant does not have a menu or website online, so here is a list of some of their vegan meals: spring rolls stuffed with vegetable, curry triangles with vegetarian filling, vegetable soup with coconut milk, Thai seasoning soup with soya bean sprouts and vegetable, vegetable with curry paste and coconut milk, and exotic fruit salad. Further vegan dishes available upon demand. Menu is in German, English, and French.
